Operating at a gentle 80 RPM, it efficiently squeezes the produce, minimizing foam and preventing clogs, ultimately maximizing your juice yield.    【Simple Assembly & Cleaning】Fretta Masticating juicer is designed for effortless use. Enjoy the convenience of quick assembly and hassle-free cleaning with our user-friendly juicer. 【Dual Modes & Reverse Function】The Fretta Slow Juice Extractor provides two-speed modes and a convenient reverse function. Choose between "Soft Mode" (85-100 RPM) for juicing oranges, watermelon, grapes, berries, and other soft fruits, or "Hard Mode" (95-110 RPM) for apples, pears, carrots, beets, celery, ginger, kale, and tougher ingredients. title: Solis 5G WiFi Mobile Hotspot for Travel, Local and International Coverage Router, Multi-Carrier Access, No Contract or SIM Card Required, 16 Connected Devices, 1GB/Month Lifetime Data
description: About this item    Introducing the Solis 5G Hotspot - Redefining Connectivity for the Modern World In today's hyper-connected world, speed, security, and flexibility are paramount. The Solis 5G Hotspot is here to meet these demands head-on. Whether you're working from a cozy local café or streaming content from the iconic Eiffel Tower, you can now enjoy lightning-fast, secure 5G and 4G LTE speeds across 135+ countries worldwide. But that's not all; with every Solis hotspot, we're thrilled to include our groundbreaking Lifetime Data* plan. This revolutionary offering gives you seamless internet access with 1GB of global data every month.    We've reimagined mobile data access with our virtual, multi-carrier network, eliminating the need for SIM cards and binding contracts. Solis 5G automatically connects to the strongest available signal, ensuring uninterrupted internet access wherever and whenever you need it. And if you ever notice a dip in coverage or data speed, our hotspots feature SignalScan, allowing you to effortlessly switch to the most robust carrier signal at your convenience.    The Solis 5G Hotspot is built to withstand the rigors of travel, boasting an IP54 ruggedized design that shields it from drops, dust, and water. It's your trusty companion, ready for any adventure. The user-friendly 2.4” LCD touch screen provides convenient access to monitor data usage, signal strength, Wi-Fi credentials, and device and network settings. Plus, if your devices are running low on battery, the Solis 5G doubles as a power bank, ensuring all your gadgets stay charged on the go.    Getting started is super simple with our included Lifetime Data. Use your Lifetime Data before considering additional data purchases, allowing you to comfortably handle emails, web browsing, and low-bandwidth activities at no extra cost. If you do find yourself in need of more data, your hotspot seamlessly transitions to any purchased plan, ensuring you're never left without connectivity when you need it most. We offer a range of data plans to suit all users—global or local, subscription or pay-as-you-go, 1GB or Unlimited data. Best of all, no contracts, and you can cancel anytime. You can also use data plans from other providers by simply inserting your own SIM card into the Solis 5G.    Experience a new era of connectivity with the Solis 5G Hotspot. Stay connected, stay secure, and stay flexible, no matter where life takes you.

availability: Temporarily out of stock.   We are working hard to be back in stock as soon as possible.
description: About this item    PLAN B ACTIVE INGREDIENT: This next day pill contains 1.5 mg of levonorgestrel, an emergency contraceptive that is used to help prevent pregnancy by temporarily delaying ovulation and/or preventing fertilization    EMERGENCY CONTRACEPTIVE: A morning after pill that helps to prevent unwanted pregnancy after birth control failure or unprotected sex with same effectiveness as Plan B.    THE DAY AFTER PILL: Emergency contraceptive for women that must be used within 72 hours (3 days) after unprotected sex or failed birth control; when taken as directed, it can significantly decrease the chance that you will get pregnant    REDUCE CHANCE OF PREGNANCY: Emergency contraception that significantly decreases the chance that you will get pregnant; 7 out of every 8 women who would have gotten pregnant will not become pregnant    USE AS DIRECTED: Should not be used as regular birth control; will not work if you are already pregnant and will not affect an existing pregnancy; will not protect you from HIV infection and other sexually transmitted diseases

description: Clear, Real-time, and Accurate Translation - While Other instant translator devices can’t translate many different languages without WiFi, the Vavus 4G Translation device features 138 languages and dialects that can be used almost anywhere in the world through our Unlimited Internet, providing high accuracy and fast speed. It's like having a handheld dictionary in your pocket. The complimentary unlimited data plan provides internet almost everywhere in the world so you can access all 138 languages without the need for WiFi. The online languages are 50% more accurate than offline languages.    We Value Your Priorities - If you love traveling and learning new cultures, we designed the most efficient Portable Instant Voice Translator. Imagine speaking sentences understood by almost 90% of the world population. If you aren’t completely happy with your 4G Translators, our US-based customer service will take care of you either through phone or email. The 𝟑-𝐚𝐱𝐢𝐬 𝐛𝐫𝐮𝐬𝐡𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐠𝐢𝐦𝐛𝐚𝐥 ensures smooth and steady footage even in 𝐥𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥-𝟓 𝐰𝐢𝐧𝐝𝐲 𝐜𝐨𝐧𝐝𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬.    【𝟏.𝟓𝐇 𝐅𝐚𝐬𝐭 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐞, 𝟗𝟔 𝐌𝐢𝐧𝐬 𝐋𝐨𝐧𝐠 𝐅𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝟑 𝐁𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐬 】ATOM Fly More Combo has a parallel charging hub supporting 𝟔𝟎𝐖 𝐟𝐮𝐥𝐥 𝐪𝐮𝐢𝐜𝐤-𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐞 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝟑 𝐛𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐬 𝐚𝐭 𝐨𝐧𝐜𝐞 𝐢𝐧 𝟏.𝟓 𝐡𝐨𝐮𝐫𝐬. The intuitive remote control makes it 𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐲 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐟𝐥𝐞𝐱𝐢𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐭𝐨 𝐜𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐥 the drone with confidence.    【𝐂𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐅𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐬, 𝐕𝐢𝐬𝐮𝐚𝐥 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐜𝐤𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐐𝐮𝐢𝐜𝐤𝐒𝐡𝐨𝐭𝐬】 The ATOM drone with camera supports accurate 𝐕𝐢𝐬𝐮𝐚𝐥 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐜𝐤𝐢𝐧𝐠 and 𝐐𝐮𝐢𝐜𝐤𝐒𝐡𝐨𝐭𝐬 like 𝐏𝐮𝐥𝐥-𝐀𝐰𝐚𝐲, 𝐑𝐨𝐜𝐤𝐞𝐭, 𝐂𝐢𝐫𝐜𝐥𝐞, 𝐒𝐩𝐢𝐫𝐚𝐥, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐁𝐨𝐨𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐠, giving you more freedom to record the creative moments around you. 𝐄𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐲𝐨𝐧𝐞 𝐜𝐚𝐧 𝐦𝐚𝐤𝐞 𝐜𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐜 𝐯𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐨𝐬.    【𝐁𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐫 𝐅𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐥𝐲, 𝐀𝐮𝐭𝐨 𝐑𝐞𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐧】The drone's 𝐞𝐧𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐝 𝐆𝐏𝐒 capabilities and return-to-home feature contribute to steady aerial shots and safe flight, allowing the drone with camera to return to its takeoff point with a tap on the phone.    【𝐀𝐥𝐰𝐚𝐲𝐬 𝐈𝐦𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐯𝐢𝐧𝐠】 All firmware supports FOTA, we recommend keeping up to date with the latest firmware to enjoy the ever-improving flight experience and shooting quality.

title: Potensic ATOM SE GPS Drone with 4K EIS Camera, Under 249g, 62 Mins Flight, 4KM FPV Transmission, Brushless Motor, Max Speed 16m/s, Auto Return, Lightweight and Foldable Drone for Adults, Beginner
description:
About this item    【𝐋𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐰𝐞𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐋𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥-𝟓 𝐖𝐢𝐧𝐝 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞】ATOM SE drone weighs 𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐧 𝟐𝟒𝟗𝐠, 𝐧𝐨 𝐧𝐞𝐞𝐝 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐅𝐀𝐀& 𝐑𝐞𝐦𝐨𝐭𝐞 𝐈𝐃 𝐑𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧. The fold-up design packs up small enough to fit in a jacket pocket. Built-in 𝐛𝐫𝐮𝐬𝐡𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐦𝐨𝐭𝐨𝐫 makes the drone 𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐬𝐭 𝐥𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥-𝟓 𝐰𝐢𝐧𝐝 and fly stably.    【𝟒𝐊 𝐄𝐈𝐒 𝐂𝐚𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐚 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐒𝐨𝐧𝐲 𝐒𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐨𝐫】The drone is equippied with a 𝟏/𝟑’’ 𝐂𝐌𝐎𝐒 𝐒𝐨𝐧𝐲 𝐒𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐨𝐫. It can shoot 𝟏𝟐𝐌𝐏 photos and 𝟒𝐊@𝟑𝟎𝐟𝐩𝐬 HD video. The exclusive ShakeVanish tech helps to take more stable and smoother images within 118° FOV and a vertical +20° to -90° camera.    【𝐁𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐫 𝐅𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐥𝐲, 𝐒𝐮𝐫𝐠𝐞𝐅𝐥𝐲 𝐅𝐥𝐞𝐱𝐢𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐥】SurgeFly flight control system provides 𝐁𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐫 𝐌𝐨𝐝𝐞 and 3 flight modes - 𝐕𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐨, 𝐍𝐨𝐫𝐦𝐚𝐥, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐒𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭- allowing you to challenge your skills as you become an advanced pilot with flexible and easy flight control experience. In Sport Mode, the max speed can be up to 16m/s in 2.8s.    【𝟔𝟐 𝐌𝐢𝐧𝐮𝐭𝐞𝐬 𝐅𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭, 𝟐 𝐁𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐬】The ATOM SE 4K drone comes with 2 intelligent 2500mAh batteries, each Battery running up to 31 minutes, for a total of 𝟔𝟐 𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐮𝐭𝐞𝐬. Fly more, charging less. Give you more freedom to record the creative moments around you.    【𝐏𝐢𝐱𝐒𝐲𝐧𝐜 𝟐.𝟎, 𝟒𝐊𝐦 𝐋𝐨𝐧𝐠 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐦𝐢𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧】The control range is up to 𝟒𝐊𝐦/𝟏𝟑,𝟏𝟐𝟑𝐟𝐭.
